Package net.nextinfinity.core.team

Interface TeamHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreTeamHandler

    public interface TeamHandler
    The TeamHandler manages Team objects and handles their creation and removal for individual Arenas as well as assignment of GamePlayers to Teams once an Arena starts.
    See Also:
    Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void assignPlayers​(Arena arena)
      Assigns players for an Arena.
      void createTeams​(Arena arena)
      Creates Team objects for the Arena.

      Gets the Teams for an Arena.
      Team getWinner​(Arena arena)
      Gets the winning Team for an Arena.
      void loadTeams​()
      Loads teams from the teams.yml file.
      void removeArena​(Arena arena)
      Removes all Teams for an Arena.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTeams

        void loadTeams​()
        Loads teams from the teams.yml file.

      • createTeams

        void createTeams​(Arena arena)
        Creates Team objects for the Arena.
        Parameters:
        arena - the Arena to create Teams for

      • getTeams

        java.util.List<Team> getTeams​(Arena arena)
        Gets the Teams for an Arena.
        Parameters:
        arena - the Arena to get Teams for
        Returns:
        the Teams associated with the Arena

      • removeArena

        void removeArena​(Arena arena)
        Removes all Teams for an Arena.
        Parameters:
        arena - the Arena to remove Teams for

      • assignPlayers

        void assignPlayers​(Arena arena)
        Assigns players for an Arena. This will balance Team sizes and fill smaller Teams first, if possible.
        Parameters:
        arena - the Arena to assign players for

      • getWinner

        Team getWinner​(Arena arena)
        Gets the winning Team for an Arena. This is the Team with the highest score. If multiple Team objects have the same highest score, a random one will be returned.
        Parameters:
        arena - the Arena to get the winner of
        Returns:
        the winning Team in the Arena
